                                                                       =

                   TThe one thing bobertron liked to do is! ! help the need=
y. He kept an open frequency to all happenings. He overheard a battle betwe=
en a maxi cheetor and some odd quickstrike. HE noticed as quickstrike and t=
he two females were carrying him off that they were on direct route to wher=
e he planned to meet tthe new maximal longhunter. HE would eventualy encoun=
ter them any way so he decided he better at least have the element of surpr=
ise. Bobertron tararize! He transformed into his robot mode and jumped down=
 and gave a quick shot to quickestrikes head. Before they new what was happ=
ening bobertron grabbed the cat and flew off. Immedidatley he comm magmatro=
n im gonna need some help here. Im gonna have three pissed off guys on my t=
ail in a nano click so move your ass!                                      =
